document.discussion_title: Pool turns Ryan Lochte's hair green
document.topic_text:
Olympic pool adds color to Ryan Lochte's new hairdo Hayden Packwood, KING 11:51 AM. PDT August 11, 2016 Michael Phelps, Ryan Lochte and Townley Haas talk before the Men's 4 x 200m Freestyle Relay Final on Day 4 of the Rio 2016 Olympic Games. (Photo: Clive Rose/Getty Images) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN GOOGLE+ PINTEREST It ain't easy being green, just ask the Olympic diving pool . But "green" appears to be the color of the Rio Olympics -- the logo, the pool and now Ryan Lochte's hair. As you may or may not know, U.S .swimmer Ryan Lochte dyed his hair. It was a new look for Rio . Aug 1, 2016 at 11:09am PDT
However, it didn't stay that color for very long. A gold-medal-winning swim in the men's 4x200m freestyle relay turned his hair as green as the other Rio pool. Yikes! Aug 9, 2016 at 11:54pm PDT
But, hey, gold goes with any color. PHOTOS: Olympic pool turns bright green Loading... RIO DE JANEIRO, BRAZIL - AUGUST 09: General view of the diving pool at Maria Lenk Aquatics Centre on Day 4 of the Rio 2016 Olympic Games at Maria Lenk Aquatics Centre on August 9, 2016 in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. (Photo by Adam Pretty/Getty Images) Adam Pretty, 2016 Getty Images A lifeguard sits by the edge of the diving pool at Maria Lenk Aquatics Centre on Day 4 of the Rio 2016 Olympic Games at Maria Lenk Aquatics Centre on August 9, 2016 in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. (Photo by Adam Pretty/Getty Images) Adam Pretty, 2016 Getty Images RIO DE JANEIRO, BRAZIL - AUGUST 09: General view of the diving pool at Maria Lenk Aquatics Centre on Day 4 of the Rio 2016 Olympic Games on August 9, 2016 in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. (Photo by Adam Pretty/Getty Images) Adam Pretty, 2016 Getty Images TOPSHOT - In this picture taken with an underwater camera Malaysia's duet Jun Hoong Cheong and Pandelela Rinong Pamg compete in the Women's Synchronised 10m Platform Final during the diving event at the Rio 2016 Olympic Games at the Maria Lenk Aquatics Stadium in Rio de Janeiro on August 9, 2016. / AFP / FRANCOIS XAVIER MARIT (Photo credit should read FRANCOIS XAVIER MARIT/AFP/Getty Images) FRANCOIS XAVIER MARIT, This content is subject to copyright. A general view shows the pool before the Women's Synchronised 10m Platform Final as part of the diving event at the Rio 2016 Olympic Games at the Maria Lenk Aquatics Stadium in Rio de Janeiro on August 9, 2016. / AFP / Martin BUREAU (Photo credit should read MARTIN BUREAU/AFP/Getty Images) MARTIN BUREAU, This content is subject to copyright. RIO DE JANEIRO, BRAZIL - AUGUST 09: General view of the diving pool at Maria Lenk Aquatics Centre on Day 4 of the Rio 2016 Olympic Games on August 9, 2016 in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. (Photo by Adam Pretty/Getty Images) Adam Pretty, 2016 Getty Images A general view shows the pool before the Women's Synchronised 10m Platform Final as part of the diving event at the Rio 2016 Olympic Games at the Maria Lenk Aquatics Stadium in Rio de Janeiro on August 9, 2016. / AFP / Odd ANDERSEN (Photo credit should read ODD ANDERSEN/AFP/Getty Images) ODD ANDERSEN, This content is subject to copyright. RIO DE JANEIRO, BRAZIL - AUGUST 09: General view of the diving pool at Maria Lenk Aquatics Centre on Day 4 of the Rio 2016 Olympic Games at Maria Lenk Aquatics Centre on August 9, 2016 in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. (Photo by Adam Pretty/Getty Images) Adam Pretty, 2016 Getty Images RIO DE JANEIRO, BRAZIL - AUGUST 09: General view of the diving pool at Maria Lenk Aquatics Centre on Day 4 of the Rio 2016 Olympic Games on August 9, 2016 in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. (Photo by Adam Pretty/Getty Images) Adam Pretty, 2016 Getty Images RIO DE JANEIRO, BRAZIL - AUGUST 09: General view of the diving pool at Maria Lenk Aquatics Centre on Day 4 of the Rio 2016 Olympic Games at Maria Lenk Aquatics Centre on August 9, 2016 in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. (Photo by Adam Pretty/Getty Images) Adam Pretty, 2016 Getty Images of
